sentences.en: Administer this draught, therefore, with thine own hand. "
sentences.cn: 所以, 还是由你亲手给她喂药吧. ”

sentences.en: And, that thou mayest live, take off this draught. "
sentences.cn: 那么, 为了你可以活下去, 把这药吃下去. ”

sentences.en: Can you close the window? I’m in a draught .
sentences.cn: 你把窗户关上好吗？我正对着风口。

sentences.en: Don't get in a draught, you aren't well yet.
Don't stand in the draught . You may catch cold.
sentences.cn: 别站在风口上, 小心着凉.

sentences.en: Having added more fruit juice on top, drink it down in one draught.
sentences.cn: 在上面再加些果汁后，把它一口喝掉。

sentences.en: He emptied his glass at one draught.
He took a draught of beer.
On a cold day there can be quite a draught from the letterbox.
sentences.cn: 天冷的时候能明显感觉到从信箱那边吹来的过堂风。

sentences.en: Put out your little tongue that I may cut it off as my payment; then you shall have the powerful draught.
sentences.cn: 伸出你小小的舌头吧，我可以把它割下来作为报酬，你也可以得到这服强烈的药剂了。

sentences.en: She downed two glasses of white wine while I dawdled over a draught beer.
sentences.cn: 我慢悠悠地呷着一杯散装啤酒的工夫她已经灌下了两杯白葡萄酒。

sentences.en: the high street shops will feel the draught most keenly.
sentences.cn: 主要商业街的商店将最明显地感到经济的下滑。

sentences.en: The restaurant is licensed, offering draught beers, wines, spirits and soft drinks.
sentences.cn: 这家餐馆有酒类经营执照，提供扎啤、葡萄酒、烈性酒和汽水。

sentences.en: The ship has a draught of 5 metres.
There is a draught in this room.
They drink bitter on draught in the local bar.
sentences.cn: 他们在当地的酒吧里喝桶装的苦啤酒。

words.tran_cn: 制图机械；制图者；设计员

phrases.tran_cn: 通风风扇；引风机；通风机

trans.tran_en: draught beer is served from a large container rather than a bottle

trans.tran_cn: 通风，气流，（船的）吃水深度，一饮，一口之量
trans.tran_en: cold air that moves through a room and that you can feel
